message: Hi Bob, I have a product I'd like to offer you. It's worth a lot to me, so I'm asking for $100. Would you be interested?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am willing to pay $85 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest. I'm willing to go down to $90, but I can't go any lower than that. Let me know if you're still interested.
